Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.scenes

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.scenes.Scene
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatScene, ChooseObjectiveCardScene, EndGameScene, GameOverviewScene, MainMenuScene, PlayerScene, RoomScene, ServerScene, StarterCardScene, WelcomeScene
public abstract class Scene extends Object
Abstract class representing a scene in the TUI.

    • getColoredUsername

      protected String getColoredUsername(VirtualPlayer player)
      Returns the username colored based on the player's color setting.
      Parameters:
      player - The virtual player whose username is to be colored.
      Returns:
      The colored username or null if the player is null.

    • getColoredUsername

      protected String getColoredUsername(String username, Color color)
      Returns the username colored based on the specified color.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to color.
      color - The color to apply.
      Returns:
      The colored username or the username with the color name appended if colors are disabled.
